main event: A witness observed a saucer-shaped object with a bright, star-like appearance on March 2, 1959, in Kinnelon, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object was described as having a red rim with white flashing lights on top,The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds,The object moved behind three trees and in front of another object,The witness reported that the object had no sound, and it appeared to be hovering at a height of about 20 feet,The witness has a background in astronomy and has often looked at stars and moons.
sighted object: saucer-shaped object with a red rim and white lights
witness description: male, 40 years old, interested in astronomy
